lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic said a member of his staff was approached about fixing a match early in his career, and he questioned whether betting companies should be allowed to sponsor big tennis tournaments.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic said a member of his staff was approached about fixing a match early in his career, and he questioned whether betting companies should be allowed to sponsor big tennis tournaments....

headline.main: Djokovic Admits Indirect Fixing Approach, Questions Betting Sponsors
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Admits Indirect Fixing Approach, Questions Betting Sponsors
